sentences.sContent: The president will address both houses of Congress.
sentences.sCn: 总统将向参众两院发表讲话。

sentences.sContent: ...Rosen bought groceries and made house payments with the help from unemployment insurance...
...because not only are the devices that house incandescent bulbs shaped to their underlying characteristics...
...I spend half my time on the streets or in the hospital and the other half making house calls to people who lived for years on the streets...
...he’d been out of work and he chose to break into a house to get money for his family and apparently in front of people that...
...We may leave our lights on in the house when we are on vacation...
...He and his wife were able to modify the mortgage on their four-bedroom house in Medford...
...said they ended up using other savings for their down payment to buy a $300000 four-bedroom house in April...

synos.tran: [建]住宅；家庭；机构；议会；某种用途的建筑物
覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内

phrases.pCn: n. 白宫（美国政府的行政机关，美国总统官邸）
温室，花房；陶瓷生坯存放室
大扫除；内部清洗；整顿组织

trans.tranOther: a group of people who make the laws of a country
